text:

trans:
Driver assistance system: high beam assistant
Driver assistance system: front collision warning with pedestrian and bicycle detection
Driver assistance system: multi-collision brake (Multi Collision Brake)
Driver assistance system: safety system with automatic emergency call (ERA GLONASS / eCall)
Driver assistance system: lane following assistant (Lane Following Assist, LFA)
Driver assistance system: traffic sign recognition, extended (cruise control/limiter system)
Electric windows front + rear
Bluetooth hands-free system
Noise-insulating windscreen
Cruise control system (cruise control) with distance control ACC
Automatic transmission - (8-stages)
Electric tailgate operation
LED rear lights
Induction charging cradle for smartphone
Interior: decorative inserts aluminum sport (dark stripe)
Interior filter: pollen filter
Interior mirror with automatic dimming
Instrument display color display 8.0 inch
Intelligent Cruise control system (SCC)
Isofix mounts for child seat
Body: 5-door
Automatic climate control 2 zones
Knee airbag on driver's side
Head airbag system
Rear headrests adjustable
Dark chrome-plated radiator grill
SPORT radiator grill, chrome frame (dark)
Solid White paint finish (Alta)
Lumbar support, front left seat, electric. adjustable
Steering wheel (leather, perforated) with multifunction
Heated steering wheel
Steering wheel with shift paddles
Steering column (steering wheel) adjustable
LM rims
Center armrest rear with cup holder
Center armrest front
Model maintenance
Engine 2.0 liter - 180 kW T-GDI KAT
Electric parking brake (EPB)
Aluminum pedals
Digital radio reception (DAB+)
Tire repair kit
Tire pressure control system
Particulate filter
Rear view camera
Split/foldable rear seat backrest
Low emissions according to Euro 6d emissions standard
Leather gearshift/selector lever handle
Windscreen wiper with rain sensor
LED headlights
Rear side airbag
Front side airbag
Front middle side airbag (center airbag)
Service system: Augmented Reality for navigation
